conclusion: To determine when the two objects are farthest apart, we need to analyze their velocity-time graphs (v-t graphs) and identify the time at which their positions are at their maximum difference.
Object A starts at position O at time t1.
Object B starts at position O at time t2.
The graph for Object A is labeled as A.
The graph for Object B is labeled as B.
The maximum distance between the two objects occurs when their positions are at their maximum difference.
Calculate the time at which the maximum distance occurs.
Object A is at position O at time t1.
Object B is at position O at time t2.
Determine the time at which the maximum distance occurs.
